mapper.insert: insert into booking(bnumber, vnumber, cemail, boption, bin, bout, bprice) values (booking_seq.nextval, #{vnumber}, #{cemail}, #{boption}, #{bin}, #{bout}, #{bprice})
mapper.update: update booking set vnumber = #{vnumber}, boption = #{boption}, bin = #{bin}, bout = #{bout}, bprice = #{bprice} where bnumber = #{bnumber}
